mapper.insert: insert into book (bookId, bookName, bookImage, bookCategory, bookDcb, bookAuthor, bookPublic, bookTitle, bookYear, ISBN, price) values (#{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookcategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookdcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookauthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookpublic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{booktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookyear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update book set bookName = #{bookname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookImage = #{bookimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookCategory = #{bookcategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookDcb = #{bookdcb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookAuthor = #{bookauthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookPublic = #{bookpublic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookTitle = #{booktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookYear = #{bookyear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISBN = #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where bookId = #{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select bookId, bookName, bookImage, bookCategory, bookDcb, bookAuthor, bookPublic, bookTitle, bookYear, ISBN, price from book where bookId = #{bookid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select bookId, bookName, bookImage, bookCategory, bookDcb, bookAuthor, bookPublic, bookTitle, bookYear, ISBN, price from book
select * from book where bookname like '%${value}%'
